snippet: --Early on Thursday morning a large mass of rock fell upon the Hudson River railroad, between Hudson and Albany. The excellent signal system of the road prevented accidents to approaching trains, and a large force of laborers speedily cleared the ...
lead_paragraph: --Early on Thursday morning a large mass of rock fell upon the Hudson River railroad, between Hudson and Albany. The excellent signal system of the road prevented accidents to approaching trains, and a large force of laborers speedily cleared the track of the obstruction.
